text: does anyone know anything about how can we create custom forms in HubSpot ?

You can pretty easily submit the data in the form to your own database whenever the user clicks submit by using the onFormSubmitted event in the advanced form options <https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/forms/advanced_form_options>

Also while there isn't really a password field in HubSpot (because it's a really bad idea to store passwords in HubSpot, possibly looking into some cryptography techniques to keep that data safe) you can define css for an individual field and in that way make it appear to be a password field
